sources.title: Crazylegs (1953) FOOTBALL BIO-PIC
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX
Stars: Elroy 'Crazylegs' Hirsch, Lloyd Nolan, Joan Vohs
Director: Francis D. Lyon

The story of Elroy "Crazylegs" Hirsch, from his high school days, into the Universities of Wisconsin and Michigan, followed by what was thought to be a career-ending fractured skull. Defying the odds, he went on to play for the Los Angeles Rams, becoming one of the great athletes of his day.

metadata.Plot: The story of the life and career of football star Elroy "Crazylegs" Hirsch (who plays himself).
metadata.Actors: Elroy 'Crazylegs' Hirsch, Lloyd Nolan, Joan Vohs
